reviews.review_msg: Disorganized, doesn't set you up for success, gives no writing feedback the entire semester and then wants a 7 page research paper due right before the final exam. Unfair expectations, way more work than any of my 400-level French courses.

The most challenging & disorganized course I have ever taken. Very difficult to understand what is going on/what material you will need for evaluations. On the exams, concepts that were never discussed in class or discussed very fleetingly. No textbook makes this class incomprehensible as you have to dig through academic papers to find information.

His disorganization makes this class REALLY frustrating. You need to dig through all his PowerPoints and articles to find the relevant information. If you read everything and attend every lecture, your mark may still be low! Not handing back assignments means  you can't tell what was expected/deemed correct for tests!
